var tx = inputs.tx
var key = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_key") key.get(tx.key)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli account create'

outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value var tx = inputs.tx var stdout = inputs.stdout;
try { tx.output = stdout;
output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash
tx.account_id = output.receipt.accountId
gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_account") gr.initialize() gr.name = output.receipt.accountId gr.account_id = output.receipt.accountId gr.insert()
tx.account = gr.sys_id
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") } } catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value var tx = inputs.tx
var key = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_key") key.get(tx.key)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli account create'
if (key.public_key) { cmd = cmd + ' --key ' + key.public_key } if (tx.memo) { cmd = cmd + ' --memo ' + tx.memo } if (tx.receiver_signature_required) { cmd = cmd + ' --reqsig' }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value var tx = inputs.tx var stdout = inputs.stdout;
try { tx.output = stdout;
output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash
tx.account_id = output.receipt.accountId
gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_account") gr.initialize() gr.name = output.receipt.accountId gr.account_id = output.receipt.accountId gr.insert()
tx.account = gr.sys_id
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") } } catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
